## IJEditor interface

编辑器接口. 继承于 IJBaseComponent 提供一系列和编辑器相关的方法.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IJEditor extends IJBaseComponent 
```
**Extends:** [IJBaseComponent](./j-html-design-editor.ijbasecomponent.md)
